description:
Kojirou is an old man in a nursing home Komari and Riki volunteer at. He has trouble keeping his room clean. He is Komari`s grandfather, although this is revealed later as he refused to tell Riki about his relationship with Komari. He is actually escaping from Komari, after she becomes insane for the first time and treats him like her dead brother.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kamikita Kojirou
